name: 莎伦·盖拉多
introduction: Sharon Gallardo is a Dominican-born, New York based actress/model. After many failed negotiations with her parents to let her move to NYC so she could finish high school at the Fiorello LaGuardia High School ( after watching Fame a 100 times of course ) She embarked on her NYC adventure and enrolled in the Evening Conservatory program at The Stella Adler Studio of Acting. She has worked as a Model on the TV show "The Face" by Naomi Campbell, modeled for Beyoncé's Merchandise collection, acted for Discovery ID shows and the Oxygen network and kept consistently working in theater. She produced and acted in a short play for The New York Winter Theater Festival in 2019 called The Pregnancy Test by Lucia Gomez-Robledo.
